channel.title: Read before you lock as admins of mopar told me to come here!
channel.description:
(to the idiots who say an admin didnt tell me to come here, nial did, he said for me to ask you guys.)
I have been having a problem with the server status page not letting me add servers...
It tells me "you only get to post one server, sorry"
I haven't even added servers is why I'm so confused.
Please tell me why it does this to me, and a few other people
the administrators of Mopar-Scape sent me here so don't argue over me posting this issue here please.
O and if it is bugged, fix it!
